name: Powerkit – Supercharge your WordPress Site
author: Code Supply Co.

sections.description:
We’ve been developing premium WordPress themes for a few years and have always been lacking essentials things in the WordPress core.

There’re numerous plugins in the WordPress repository, however if you install them all, there’s inconsistency in their backend and frontend styles and possible plugin conflicts.

That’s why we created Powerkit, essentials components for every WordPress blog or magazine.

Components have modular structure and can be enabled or disabled with a single click. They have been thoroughly tested and play well together.

Social Integrations

  • Share Buttons
  • Social Links
  • Facebook Integration
  • Pinterest Integration
  • Twitter Integration
  • Instagram Integration

Marketing

  • Opt-In Forms

Content Presentation

  • Basic Shortcodes
  • Justified Gallery
  • Slider Gallery
  • Lightbox
  • Typekit Fonts
  • Custom Fonts

Image Optimization

  • Retina Images
  • Lazyload

Utilities

  • Contributors Widget
  • Author Widget
  • Featured Posts Widget
  • Scroll To Top Button
sections.installation:
1. Upload powerkit to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enable or disable modules in the Powerkit menu
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes, Powerkit is free both for personal and commercial use. You may even bundle Powerkit with your own WordPress themes.

I feel lost. Where can I find the complete plugin documentation?

The complete docs can be found here.

Can I extend Powerkit?

Sure! Powerkit is developer-friendly. There’re numerous hooks and filters, so extending Powerkit and integrating it with your theme is easy. Please refer to our documentation for developers.

sections.reviews:
Makes site complete! Great plugin

By JAHM (hrsoft) on August 18, 2023

It's making the wordpress site powerfull. I have a suggestion, please make the html content generated from the plugin like social links, buttons valid with accessiblity features would be great.

Nice Plugin with many Functions

By sackgeld on March 10, 2022

Thanks for your work!

Slider is broken on Firefox and Safari

By soulipsyz on December 5, 2021

Slider doesn't work.

Very good so far!

By maik2558 on June 11, 2021

Love it! Thank you :)

Mostly Great But Some Features Are Lazy

By alikgriffin on September 11, 2020

The plugin is pretty good with the integration of everything, especially if your theme takes advantage of it. Some of the features are lazy and don't work well. The Tiled, or Justified Gallery is very poorly done. It crops your images and requires a mix of horizontal and vertical images for it to look halfway decent. It would be actually useful if they implemented it more like Jetpack does the tiled galleries. It's a shame because their gallery looks really nice and clean. For SEO it would also be nice if the images from the featured posts on the sidebar ware scaled properly.

I don't know why EVERYONE isn't using this!

By rbreitkreutz on June 23, 2020

LOVE this plugin. It came bundled with one of my last themes and now I will use it on every site I build going forward. It's awesome that you can select which features to turn on and off depending what you need. Lazy load is great. My fav feature is the ability to add table of contents to my longer posts Super handy and user friendly - two thumbs up! Oh for the developers, if you're reading these - I wish there were a little more documentation for using this plugin when it isn't integrated with a theme already. Thanks!

Amazing

By samtronic on March 8, 2020

Please replace Magnific Popup with Photoswipe by the same author but mobile friendly. I'm interested in your themes. Can you create demos with background images with opacity overlay? Thanks!

OH GOD ! 1000/10

By jonatha (jonathabarbosa) on January 4, 2020

no words, just go download and see for yourself!

One of the best choice plugins

By Iqbal Mauludy (iqbalmauludy) on July 4, 2019

one of the best plugins I've ever met. I am very helped by the features that are available. Hopefully in the future it can support Gutenberg without having to use the Classic shortcode again.

Found the Golden Swiss ToolKit for Wordpress

By (BLUE_LIFE) on June 21, 2019

Kudos to the team, this is a PEARL that every Wordpress user should have. AMAZING. Extremely complete. light. super well maintained. The team is beyond usual reactivity from developpers. I am stunned and so happy. Using it with one of their theme ( which is also a pure gem ), but can be used with any theme. Congrats and Thank you Code Supply.

short_description: Essential components for every WordPress site: share buttons, social links, social media integrations, galleries, lazyload, custom widgets, and more.
description:
We’ve been developing premium WordPress themes for a few years and have always been lacking essentials things in the WordPress core.

There’re numerous plugins in the WordPress repository, however if you install them all, there’s inconsistency in their backend and frontend styles and possible plugin conflicts.

That’s why we created Powerkit, essentials components for every WordPress blog or magazine.

Components have modular structure and can be enabled or disabled with a single click. They have been thoroughly tested and play well together.

Social Integrations

  • Share Buttons
  • Social Links
  • Facebook Integration
  • Pinterest Integration
  • Twitter Integration
  • Instagram Integration

Marketing

  • Opt-In Forms

Content Presentation

  • Basic Shortcodes
  • Justified Gallery
